name: DreamLoop (Fmlad)
description:
[few bugs still left in the game, will be tidying them up soon]

-AUDIO ON IS RECOMMENDED - 

Dreamloop is a suspenseful 2D Adventure game where you take control of a scared confused boy experiencing traumatic memories through dreams. As Timmy you will continue a unique playthrough after every sleep and find the dream changes as you continue to uncover the mysteries at large.

~ Thank you for stopping by and playing my small gamejam game made within 72 hours all by my own hands with no extra help. All assets except audio were made by myself and I really enjoyed working on this.

CONTROLS:
WSAD to Move
E, SPACE for Interactivity

Credits:

"Dreams Become Real" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
